publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3597 Margaret Mitchell: Drivers’ Awareness Evening—That the Parliament congratulates Strathclyde Police and the Wishaw Crime Prevention Panel on their recent drivers’ awareness evening held at a local garage and designed to be particularly useful to female drivers; recognises that the evening’s presentation was designed to increase awareness of potentially dangerous situations, focusing on areas such as planning a journey, road rage and safe parking as well as practical car checks including tyre pressure and treads, lights, oil and engine fluids and changing tyres; notes that the feedback from the evening has been very positive, and welcomes the fact that another event has been planned for later in March.

S3M-3597 Drivers’ Awareness Evening (lodged on 3 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Alasdair Allan*, Elizabeth Smith*, Mary Scanlon*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Aitken*, Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Ted Brocklebank*, John Lamont*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Jackson Carlaw*, Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3597 Drivers’ Awareness Evening (lodged on 3 March 2009) Murdo Fraser*, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-3597 Margaret Mitchell: Drivers’ Awareness Evening—That the Parliament congratulates Strathclyde Police and the Wishaw Crime Prevention Panel on their recent drivers’ awareness evening held at a local garage and designed to be particularly useful to female drivers; recognises that the evening’s presentation was designed to increase awareness of potentially dangerous situations, focusing on areas such as planning a journey, road rage and safe parking as well as practical car checks including tyre pressure and treads, lights, oil and engine fluids and changing tyres; notes that the feedback from the evening has been very positive, and welcomes the fact that another event has been planned for later in March 2009. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alasdair Allan, Elizabeth Smith, Mary Scanlon, Nanette Milne, Jamie McGrigor, Bill Aitken, Robin Harper, Hugh O’Donnell, Ted Brocklebank, John Lamont, Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Jackson Carlaw, Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Bill Kidd, Murdo Fraser, Stuart McMillan, Gil Paterson
S3M-3597 Drivers’ Awareness Evening (lodged on 3 March 2009) Angela Constance*
